Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Division and Central due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Division and Central, due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/31st
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland, X9 Ashland Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland Orange Line, Archer, Loomis, Cermak and Ashland, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland, #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland Orange Line, Archer, Loomis, Cermak and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/31st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
